info.title: API Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the site, powered by Mash Server.

get.summary: Lists all MLM Referral Conditions with pagination and optional filtering

200.description: List of MLM Referral Conditions with pagination information

get.description: Retrieves dashboard data for the authenticated affiliate, with optional period filtering.
Retrieves the current user's affiliate network data for client visualization.

200.description: Analytics data object matching your shape (kpis + chart keys)

get.summary: Fetch MLM node details by UUID
get.description: Retrieves information about a specific MLM node using its UUID.

get.summary: Get details for a single referral
Lists all MLM Referral Rewards with pagination and optional filtering

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: List of MLM Referral Rewards with pagination information

id.description: ID of the MLM Referral Reward

isClaimed.description: Whether the reward has been claimed

conditionId.description: ID of the MLM Referral Condition associated with the reward

referrerId.description: ID of the user who referred another user

createdAt.description: Creation date of the MLM Referral Reward

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the MLM Referral Reward

post.description: Processes the claim of a specified referral reward.

get.summary: Retrieves all investments for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches all AI trading investments for the currently authenticated user, excluding active investments.

id.description: The unique identifier for the investment

userId.description: User ID associated with the investment

planId.description: Plan ID associated with the investment

durationId.description: Duration ID associated with the investment

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the investment was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the investment was last updated

post.description: Creates a new AI trading investment for the currently authenticated user based on the provided details.

planId.description: Plan ID to be used for the investment

del.description: Deletes an existing AI trading investment for the currently authenticated user.

get.summary: Retrieves specific investment by ID for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches a specific AI trading investment by ID for the currently authenticated user.

id.description: The unique identifier for the investment

userId.description: User ID associated with the investment

planId.description: Plan ID associated with the investment

durationId.description: Duration ID associated with the investment

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the investment was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the investment was last updated

get.summary: Retrieves all active AI trading plans
get.description: Fetches all active AI trading plans available for users to invest in, including details about each plan and its associated durations.

id.description: The unique identifier for the trading plan

image.description: URL of the image representing the trading plan

minAmount.description: Minimum amount required to invest in the plan

maxAmount.description: Maximum amount allowed for investment in the plan

invested.description: Total amount currently invested in the plan

trending.description: Indicator if the plan is trending

durations.description: List of durations available for this trading plan

timeframe.description: Timeframe of the duration (e.g., days, months)

get.description: Fetches all active ecommerce categories along with their active products, with calculated ratings and review counts for each product.

id.description: The unique identifier for the category

image.description: URL of the image representing the category

products.description: List of active products in this category

get.summary: Retrieves a specific ecommerce category by slug
get.description: Fetches a single ecommerce category by its slug, including all active products in that category with calculated ratings and review counts.

id.description: The unique identifier for the category

image.description: URL of the image representing the category

products.description: List of active products in this category

post.summary: Applies a discount code to a product
post.description: Allows a user to apply a discount code to a product if the discount is active and has not expired.

schema.description: Product ID to which the discount is applied

id.description: The unique identifier for the discount

status.description: The current status of the discount (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE)

get.summary: Lists all ecommerce orders with pagination and optional filtering

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: List of ecommerce orders with details about order items and the user

userId.description: User ID associated with the order

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the order

post.description: Processes a new order for the logged-in user, checking inventory, wallet balance, and applying any available discounts.

discountId.description: Discount ID applied to the order

amount.description: Quantity of the product to purchase

get.summary: Checks if user purchased a specific product
get.description: Fetches an order containing the given productId for the authenticated user, to verify purchase.

200.description: Order containing the product retrieved successfully

id.description: The unique identifier for the order

orderItems.description: List of items in the order

404.description: Ecommerce Order for Product not found

get.summary: Retrieves a specific order by ID
get.description: Fetches a single order by its ID, including details of the products in the order.

id.description: The unique identifier for the order

orderItems.description: List of items in the order

get.description: Fetches a list of all active ecommerce products, including their categories and aggregated review stats.

id.description: The unique identifier for the product

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product was created

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product

get.summary: Retrieves a specific ecommerce product by slug
get.description: Fetches a single ecommerce product by its slug, including details such as category and reviews.

id.description: The unique identifier for the product

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product was created

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product

post.summary: Creates or updates a review for a product
post.description: Allows a user to submit a review for a product they have purchased. Users can only review products once, but they can update their review.

get.description: Returns all shipping records for the current user, including all related order, items, products, and addresses.
Fetches all items in the user's wishlist, including product details, categories, and reviews.

id.description: The unique identifier for the product

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the product was created

reviews.description: List of reviews for the product

post.summary: Adds a product to the user's wishlist
post.description: Allows a user to add a product to their wishlist if it's not already included.

productId.description: Product ID to be added to the wishlist

del.summary: Removes a product from the user's wishlist
del.description: Allows a user to remove a product from their wishlist.

schema.description: Product ID to be removed from the wishlist

get.summary: Retrieves historical data for a specific symbol
get.description: Fetches historical price data based on the specified interval and date range.

schema.description: Time interval for the data, e.g., 1m, 5m, 1h

get.description: Allows administrative unlocking of a custodial wallet deposit address to make it available for reuse. This is typically used for NO_PERMIT token addresses that need to be released after deposit completion.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The deposit address to unlock (must be a valid address format)

message.description: Success message indicating the address has been unlocked.

timestamp.description: ISO timestamp of when the unlock occurred

get.description: Fetches a list of all active markets available in the ecosystem.
Fetches details of a specific market in the ecosystem.
Retrieves a list of orders for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Symbol of the order to retrieve.

post.description: Submits a new trading order for the logged-in user.

price.description: Price of the order (required if limit)

del.description: Cancels an open trading order and refunds the unfulfilled amount, including fee adjustments for partial fills.

get.description: Fetches a list of all active tokens available in the ecosystem.
Fetches details of a specific token in the ecosystem.

get.summary: Lists all wallets for the logged-in user
get.description: Retrieves all wallets associated with the logged-in user, optionally including transactions and address.

get.summary: Fetches a specific wallet by currency
get.description: Retrieves details of a wallet associated with the logged-in user by its currency.

post.description: Allows a user to transfer funds to another user's wallet.

schema.description: UUID of the recipient's wallet or user

message.description: Success message indicating the transfer has been processed.

post.summary: Withdraws funds to an external address
post.description: Processes a withdrawal from the user's wallet to an external address.

message.description: Success message indicating the withdrawal has been processed.

get.description: Retrieves distinct FAQ categories.
Retrieves active FAQ entries with optional search and category filters.

post.description: Allows a user to submit a question if they cannot find an answer in the FAQs.
Records a search query used on the FAQ page.
Creates or updates a feedback record for a specific FAQ. If a feedback record already exists for the user and FAQ, it updates the comment field.

get.description: Retrieves a single FAQ entry by its ID, including its related FAQs, computed helpfulCount from feedback, and increments the view count.

200.description: FAQ retrieved successfully with related FAQs, helpfulCount and updated view count embedded

get.summary: Retrieves all Forex accounts for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches all Forex accounts associated with the currently authenticated user.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the Forex account

type.description: Type of the account (DEMO or LIVE)

user.description: User details associated with the account

post.summary: Deposits money into a specified Forex account
post.description: Allows a user to deposit money from their wallet into a Forex account.

get.summary: Retrieves a specific Forex account by ID
get.description: Fetches a specific Forex account by its ID for the currently authenticated user.

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the Forex account

type.description: Type of the account (DEMO or LIVE)

user.description: User details associated with the account

post.summary: Withdraws money from the specified Forex account
post.description: Allows a user to withdraw money from their Forex account into their wallet.

userId.description: User ID

updatedAt.description: Transaction update date

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available Forex investment durations, ordered by timeframe (HOUR, DAY, WEEK, MONTH) then duration ascending.

get.summary: Retrieves active Forex investments for the logged-in user
get.description: Fetches active Forex investments associated with the currently authenticated user.

userId.description: User ID

get.summary: Lists all Forex Investments with pagination and optional filtering

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: List of Forex Investments with pagination information

userId.description: ID of the User

updatedAt.description: Last Update Date of the Investment

post.description: Allows a user to initiate a new Forex investment.

userId.description: User ID

status.description: Investment status (ACTIVE, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, or REJECTED)

updatedAt.description: Investment update timestamp

get.summary: Retrieves detailed information of a specific forex investment by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the forex investment to retrieve

userId.description: User ID

put.description: Fetches details of a specific Forex investment for the logged-in user.

userId.description: User ID

get.description: Retrieves user-specific dashboard data including overview statistics, chart data, plan distribution, and recent investments.
Retrieves a list of forex investment plans filtered and sorted based on query parameters. Parameters include activeTab, search, minProfit, maxInvestment, and sortBy.

parameters.name: activeTab
parameters.description: If set to "trending", only trending plans are returned.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter plans by title or description.

parameters.name: minProfit
parameters.description: Minimum profit value (number) that a plan must have.

parameters.name: maxInvestment
parameters.description: Maximum investment allowed. Plans with "maxAmount" (defaulting to 100000 if missing) must be less than or equal to this value.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort the plans by "popularity" (invested descending), "profit" (profitPercentage descending) or "minInvestment" (minAmount ascending).

get.description: Fetches details of a specific Forex investment plan for the logged-in user along with available durations, plus the total number of distinct investors and the total invested amount.

invested.description: Total invested amount in this plan

trending.description: Indicates if the plan is trending

totalInvestors.description: Total distinct users who invested in this plan

get.description: Retrieves platform-wide forex stats: number of active investors, total invested amount, average return (completed investments), and number of countries served.

averageReturn.description: Average return percentage for completed investments.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: Paginated list of transactions retrieved successfully

type.description: Type of the transaction (DEPOSIT, WITHDRAW, etc.)

status.description: Current status of the transaction (PENDING, COMPLETED, etc.)

trxId.description: Transaction ID from the payment processor

get.summary: Retrieves historical data for a specific futures symbol
get.description: Fetches historical price data based on the specified interval and date range.

schema.description: Time interval for the data, e.g., 1m, 5m, 1h

get.description: Fetches a list of all active futures markets.
Fetches details of a specific futures market.
Retrieves a list of futures orders for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of the orders to retrieve.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Pair of the orders to retrieve.

stop_loss_price.description: Stop loss price, converted from bigint

take_profit_price.description: Take profit price, converted from bigint

post.summary: Creates a new futures trading order
post.description: Submits a new futures trading order for the logged-in user.

side.description: Order side, either buy or sell

price.description: Price of the order (not required for market orders)

stopLossPrice.description: Stop loss price for the order

takeProfitPrice.description: Take profit price for the order

del.summary: Cancels an existing futures trading order
del.description: Cancels an open futures trading order and refunds the unfulfilled amount.

get.description: Retrieves a list of futures positions for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of the positions to retrieve.

parameters.name: pair
parameters.description: Pair of the positions to retrieve.

del.description: Closes an open futures position for the logged-in user.

side.description: Position side, either buy or sell

get.description: Retrieves ticker information for all available market pairs.
Retrieves all active blockchain configurations for users.

Retrieves aggregated investor details (including total amount invested, total tokens purchased, latest transaction date, rejected investment amount, and token info from the ICO offering) for ICO offerings created by the authenticated creator. Supports pagination, sorting, and searching. (Aggregation is done by computing valid transactions (PENDING/RELEASED) and rejected transactions separately.)

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Field to sort by. For associated fields use dot notation (e.g. 'user.firstName'). Defaults to 'lastTransactionDate'.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction: asc or desc (default: desc)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query to filter by investor first or last name

post.description: Creates a new ICO offering along with token details, team members, and roadmap items. Also verifies user wallet balance and deducts the launch fee based on the selected launch plan.

selectedPlan.description: ID of the selected launch plan

get.description: Retrieves all launch plans for ICO admin.
Retrieves chart data (daily, weekly, or monthly performance) for the authenticated creator's ICO offerings based on a specified time range.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Time range for chart data: '7d' for current week (Mondayâ€“Sunday), '30d' for current month (daily), '90d' for 3 full months (from start of two months before current month till end of current month), or 'all' for all time (monthly, extended to at least 12 months).

get.description: Retrieves aggregated statistics (counts, growth metrics) for the authenticated creator's ICO offerings, and calculates total raised and raise growth from all transactions except those with a 'REJECTED' status.
Retrieves ICO offerings for the authenticated creator, grouped by status (active, pending, completed) along with currentRaised for each offering.
Retrieves detailed ICO offering data (including phases, token detail, team members, roadmap items, launch plan, computed stats, investor count, and rejected funds) for the authenticated creator.

put.description: Updates the launch plan for the specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

get.description: Retrieves token release transactions for a given token (offering) ID, optionally filtered by status and paginated with sorting support.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter transactions by status (PENDING, VERIFICATION, RELEASED)

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Field to sort by (default is createdAt). For associated models use dot notation (e.g., 'user.firstName')

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction: asc or desc (default is desc)

put.description: Submits the transaction hash after sending tokens to the investor and updates the token release status to VERIFICATION.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the token release transaction

200.description: Token release transaction hash submitted successfully.

get.summary: Get Roadmap Items for ICO Offering
get.description: Retrieves roadmap items for the ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

post.description: Adds a new roadmap item to the specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

del.description: Deletes a roadmap item from the specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

put.description: Updates a roadmap item of a specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

get.summary: Get Team Members for ICO Offering
get.description: Retrieves team members for the ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

post.summary: Add a Team Member to an ICO Offering
post.description: Adds a new team member to the specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

del.description: Deletes a team member from the specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

put.description: Updates a team member of a specified ICO offering for the authenticated creator.

get.description: Fetches updates for a specific token offering.

post.description: Creates a new update for a token offering by the authenticated creator.

del.description: Deletes an update for a token offering by the authenticated creator.

put.description: Edits an existing update for a token offering by the authenticated creator.

get.description: Returns the most popular ICO token offerings (by total raised).

Retrieves ICO token offerings filtered by a given status and additional query parameters such as pagination, search, sort, blockchain, tokenType. If the status is 'COMPLETED', the endpoint returns offerings with statuses 'SUCCESS' and 'FAILED'.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The offering status to filter by (e.g., ACTIVE, UPCOMING, COMPLETED). Use COMPLETED to fetch offerings with SUCCESS or FAILED status.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page for pagination.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter offerings by name or symbol.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort option for offerings. Valid values: newest, oldest, raised-high, raised-low, target-high, target-low, ending-soon.

parameters.name: blockchain
parameters.description: Filter by blockchain. Accepts one or more values (e.g., Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, Binance Smart Chain).

parameters.name: tokenType
parameters.description: Filter by token type. Accepts one or more values (e.g., Utility, Security, Governance).

status.description: Current status (ACTIVE, PENDING, etc.). For COMPLETED queries, the status may be SUCCESS or FAILED.

isPaused.description: Flag if the offering is paused

isFlagged.description: Flag if the offering is flagged

tokenPrice.description: Token price in the current phase

endsIn.description: Days until the phase ends (calculated dynamically)

tokenPrice.description: Token price in the next phase

endsIn.description: Days until the phase ends (using its full duration)

phases.description: List of all phases for the offering

duration.description: Duration in days for the phase

currentRaised.description: Sum of all transactions (price * amount) associated with this offering

get.description: Retrieves detailed ICO token offering data by its unique identifier. The response includes related phases, token details, team members, and roadmap items. Additionally, it calculates the current and next phases based on the offering's start date and the durations of its phases.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the ICO offering

status.description: Current status (ACTIVE, PENDING, etc.). For COMPLETED queries, the status may be SUCCESS or FAILED.

isPaused.description: Flag if the offering is paused

isFlagged.description: Flag if the offering is flagged

phases.description: List of all phases for the offering

currentRaised.description: Sum of all transactions (price * amount) associated with this offering

get.description: Retrieves all available ICO launch plans.

Retrieves a summary of the user's ICO portfolio including total invested, pending investment, pending verification investment, received investment, rejected investment, current portfolio value, total profit/loss, and ROI. Pending investments indicate funds invested for tokens not yet received, and rejected investments indicate funds that were refunded.

Generates historical performance data and calculates metrics for the user's ICO portfolio based on real transactions and token offering data. The timeframe (e.g. '1W', '1M', '3M', '1Y', 'ALL') specifies the period to compute over. Additionally, a metric for rejected investments is provided.

performanceData.description: Array of daily performance data points.

get.description: Retrieves ICO platform statistics including total raised funds, growth percentage, successful offerings count, total investors, and average ROI. Calculations are now based on all non-rejected transactions and monthly comparisons.
Retrieves all enabled token type configurations for users.

200.description: Enabled token type configurations retrieved successfully.

get.summary: Lists ICO transactions with optional filters

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: Paginated list of ICO transactions retrieved successfully

type.description: Type of the transaction (DEPOSIT, WITHDRAW, etc.)

status.description: Current status of the transaction (PENDING, COMPLETED, etc.)

trxId.description: Transaction ID from the payment processor

post.description: Creates a new ICO investment transaction for the authenticated user using icoTransaction only. The wallet type and currency are derived from the associated plan. It also deducts funds from the user's wallet, records the transaction, updates offering stats, and sends email and inâ€‘app notifications to both investor and seller.

walletAddress.description: Wallet address where tokens will be sent

400.description: Missing required fields or insufficient balance.

get.description: Retrieves detailed ICO transaction data by its unique identifier, including associated offering and user details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the ICO transaction

price.description: Token price at time of transaction

status.description: Transaction status. One of PENDING, VERIFICATION, RELEASED, or REJECTED

releaseUrl.description: Transaction hash (or release URL, if used in its place)

tokenAmount.description: Calculated token amount (amount divided by token price)

type.description: Derived transaction type (for example, 'completed' if released, otherwise 'pending')

get.description: Retrieves recent trading activity logs for the authenticated user.
Retrieves dashboard data including notifications, portfolio, stats, trading activity, and transactions for the authenticated user.
Retrieves the portfolio summary for the authenticated user.
Retrieves various trade counts and stats for the authenticated user.
Retrieves recent trade transactions for the authenticated user.

post.description: Finds matching offers based on guided matching criteria provided by the authenticated user.

get.summary: List Distinct Countries from User Profiles
get.description: Retrieves a list of distinct countries extracted from user profile locations.
Retrieves highlighted market data (for example, top active offers).
Retrieves aggregated market statistics from P2P trades.
Retrieves the top cryptocurrencies based on trade volume aggregations.

get.summary: Lists all p2p offers with pagination and optional filtering

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Default: 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sorting: asc or desc.

200.description: Paginated list of p2p offers with detailed information

post.description: Creates a new offer with structured configurations for the authenticated user, and associates payment methods.

paymentMethodIds.description: Array of P2P paymentâ€method IDs to attach

get.description: Retrieves popular offers ordered by a calculated popularity score based on the number of completed trades (via offerId) and average review ratings from those trades.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of offers to return

get.description: Retrieves detailed offer data by its ID, including computed seller metrics and ratings.
Retrieves a list of available payment methods using the payment methods model.

post.description: Creates a new custom payment method for the authenticated user.

del.description: Deletes an existing custom payment method by its ID.

404.description: Payment method not found or not owned by user.

put.description: Updates an existing custom payment method by its ID.

requestBody.description: Fields to update for the payment method

404.description: Payment method not found or not owned by user.

get.description: Retrieves aggregated trade data for the authenticated user.

post.description: Cancels a trade with a provided cancellation reason.
Updates the trade status to 'PAYMENT_SENT' to confirm that payment has been made.
Creates a dispute for a trade by providing a reason and description.

get.description: Retrieves detailed trade data for the given trade ID.
Retrieves messages (stored in timeline) for the specified trade.

post.description: Sends a message within a trade (appended to the timeline).
Releases funds and updates the trade status to 'COMPLETED' for the authenticated seller.
Submits a review for a trade with rating and feedback.

walletId.description: Wallet ID to process the payment

200.description: Payment confirmed successfully with redirect URL

404.description: Payment intent or wallet not found

description.description: Optional description for the payment intent

post.summary: Checks the status of a payment intent

del.description: Cancel and remove a specific payment intent.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the payment intent to delete.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific payment intent.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the payment intent to retrieve.

userId.description: User associated with the payment intent.

products.description: List of products associated with the payment intent.

post.description: Calculates potential rewards for a given amount and duration based on available staking pools.

tokenId.description: Optional token ID to filter pools

get.description: Retrieves all active staking pools available for users to stake in.
Retrieves detailed analytics for a specific staking pool.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific staking pool.
Retrieves all staking positions for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new staking position for the authenticated user by staking tokens into a specified pool.

poolId.description: The ID of the staking pool

amount.description: The amount of tokens to stake

userId.description: User ID

updatedAt.description: Last update timestamp

400.description: Invalid request parameters or business logic validation failed

post.description: Claims all unclaimed earnings for a specific staking position.

get.description: Retrieves all earnings records for a specific staking position.
Retrieves detailed information about a specific staking position.

post.description: Initiates a withdrawal request for a specific staking position.

get.description: Returns total staked value, active users, and average APR.
Retrieves all staking earnings for the authenticated user across all positions.
Retrieves a summary of the user's staking activity across all positions.

post.summary: Check account deletion code and delete user
post.description: Checks the deletion code, deletes the user's account if valid, and sends a confirmation email.

email.description: Email of the user confirming account deletion

post.description: Generates a code for confirming account deletion and sends it to the user's email.

email.description: Email of the user requesting account deletion

get.description: Logs in a user to the chat service and returns a session token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., invalid email or password)

post.description: Verifies the OTP for login and returns a session token. If the OTP is invalid, the provided code is checked against the recovery codes.

otp.description: OTP or recovery code to verify

200.description: OTP or recovery code verified successfully, user logged in

post.description: Resends the OTP for 2FA
Saves the OTP secret and type for the user
Enables or disables OTP for the user

post.description: Registers a new user using Google and returns a session token
Registers a new user and returns a session token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., email already in use)

post.description: Initiates a password reset process for a user and sends an email with a reset link

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful

404.description: User not found with the provided email

get.description: Retrieves all roles
Retrieves session data from Redis by sessionId

post.summary: Verifies the email with the provided token
post.description: Verifies the email with the provided token

400.description: Invalid request (e.g., missing or invalid token)

post.description: Verifies a password reset token and sets the new password
